name: agentinabox-v2

scripts.build:all: cd web && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && cd ../desktop && npx tsc
scripts.copy:web: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function cpdir(s,d){fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});for(const f of fs.readdirSync(s)){const sp=path.join(s,f),dp=path.join(d,f);fs.statSync(sp).isDirectory()?cpdir(sp,dp):fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp)}}cpdir('web/dist','server/public')"
scripts.desktop:build: npm run build:all && npm run copy:web

author: AgenticLedger
description: Agent-in-a-Box v2 â€” Enterprise AI agent platform with soul, memory, proactive behavior, and multi-channel delivery. Every capability independently toggleable via license flags.
